document_data.caption: A magma drake (left), an [[ooze drake]] (top), a [[smoke drake]] (middle), and a [[water drake]] (bottom).
document_data.name: Magma drake
document_data.subtype3e: [[:Category:Creatures with the earth subtype|Earth]], [[:Category:Creatures with the fire subtype|fire]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Magma drakes''' were possibly the most powerful of the [[elemental drake]]s.
document_data.Description: Magma drakes resembled {{SIAdj|12|ft|adj=long}} dragons with scales that looked like cooling lava and crimson eyes. They were surprisingly agile despite a superficially slow and clumsy appearance.
document_data.Personality: Magma drakes were said to be malevolent creatures.
document_data.Abilities: Magma drakes had an affinity for both earth and fire: they could detect creatures that moved on the ground, and could burn enemies with their very touch.
document_data.Combat: Magma drakes preferred to attack enemies one at a time, using flight to separate foes from their group if possible, before watching pinned victims burn to death.
document_data.Ecology: Magma drakes typically lived in deep caverns or volcanic craters, especially those with water nearby. They were known to ally with [[efreet]]i and [[salamander]]s.
